div.p: This case-sensitive code system http://terminology.kemkes.go.id/CodeSystem/examination defines the following codes in a Is-A heirarchy:

tr.td: MR DWI/FLAIR + MR Angiografi + MR Perfusi
Gen N dan Orf 1ab SARS CoV-2 RNA (TCM)
Guidance angioplasti balon transluminal arteri perifer
Guidance angioplasti balon transluminal ginjal atau arteri viseral lain
Guidance percutaneous transhepatic biliary drainage dengan monitoring kontras
MR abdomen atas dinamik dengan kontras
MR cochlea dan DTI dengan kontras
MR whole abdomen dynamic dengan kontras IV
MRCP dynamic nonkontras diikuti dengan kontras IV
RF guidance pemasangan alat pacu jantung
XR schedel AP dan lateral nonkontras
XR thorakolumbal AP, lateral, oblique kanan dan kiri
Kontras MRI Brain + MR Perfusi + MRS
Pemeriksaan Dahak Follow Up BTA dan Biakan Pasien TBC RO (Bulan 1-12) BTA
Pemeriksaan Dahak Follow Up BTA dan Biakan Pasien TBC RO (Bulan 1-12) biakan
H High Dosage [Susceptibility] by Method for Slow-growing mycobacteria
H - SLID - capreomycin [Susceptibility] by Method for Slow-growing mycobacteria
Moxifloxacin High Dosage [Susceptibility] by Method for Slow-growing mycobacteria
Delamanid [Susceptibility] by Method for Slow-growing mycobacteria
Bedaquiline [Susceptibility] by Method for Slow-growing mycobacteria
